name: Power of sale process
text:
PART II.  POWER OF SALE FORECLOSURE PROCESS
 
Note
 
  Part heading amended by L 2012, c 182, §3(7).
 
Law Journals and Reviews
 
  Hawaii 2000 Report Regarding Lawyers' Opinion Letters in Mortgage Loan Transactions.  22 UH L. Rev. 347 (2000).
 
     §667-21  Power of sale process.  The power of sale process in this part is an alternative to the foreclosure by action in part IA. [L 1998, c 122, pt of §1; am L 2011, c 48, §20; am L 2012, c 182, §15]
